admin.overrideFilter: Categories can override filtering (ba always visible)
admin.overrideSort: Categories can override sorting (be always on top)
admin.activeUsersWeight: Weight of number of active users
admin.weights: Weights of components used to sort by Popularity
admin.recentPostsWeight: Weight of number of new posts (created in last week)
admin.popularTopicsWeight: Weight of number of popular topics
admin.pageViewsMonthWeight: Weight of number of views in past month
admin.pageViewsDayWeight: Weight of number of during last 24 hours
admin.monthlyPostsWeight: Weight of number of posts in last month
admin.membership: Allow users to filter categories by membership in groups with the same name
